tagline: Turns publicly available competitor data into strategic intelligence that informs real business decisions.
pros: Reads strategic direction from hiring patterns, filings, and product changes
Builds living competitive profiles that stay current
Strong at separating noise from actionable intelligence
Creates sales-ready battlecards and positioning maps
cons: Requires regular time investment to maintain intelligence freshness
Analysis depth limited to publicly available sources
May over-index on competitor moves at the expense of internal focus

model_recommendations.notes: Solid reasoning + good writing. Benefits from thinking but doesn't need max reasoning. Best cost/capability balance.
